name: Apocalypse Of Crabs
description:
A crab army is attacking the beach. You will try to defend your homeland. If you dare, try to survive about 10 minutes. If you do, You can rescue your citizens. 

We developed this game as a two-person team in 24 hours. Unfortunately, we couldn't do much about performance and bugs. We worked with limited materials in a limited time. We will attach the assets we used below. The game lasts for 10 minutes, and there is a nice surprise waiting for you at the 10th minute. Please be patient and wait for it.

Five Seamless Tileable Ground Textures

Super Beach Pack

Crab from Turbo Squit

Cansev Çetin - The person who finds the necessary assets for the game

Bilal Semerci - Game Designer & Developer

(Please wait for the end of 10 mnt. There is a big surprise.)
